title: Image-organizer web app
description: Photo organizer web app that saves users' time by using Tensorflow AI to set names for images

title: JSON game engine
description: C++ Kahoot-inspired game engine that allows users to host their game room on a decentralized server and customize their games by inputting JSON data

title: Android App for construction workers
description: A mobile networking app that aims to improve communication between construction workers and construction supervisors

title: Restaurant dine-in website
description: A restaurant website that allows customer to book table and order food through an Vue interface, backend was built with Flask to pull data from MySQL http server
